title: Neon Velocity: Midnight City Sprint
prompt: (masterpiece), best quality, detailed 2D Anime illustration, 16:9 aspect ratio, a lone cyclist in an aerodynamic blue and orange suit races intensely down a wet, cyberpunk city street at night. Extreme dynamic perspective (low angle, centered), focused on the bicycle splashing water. The scene is saturated with reflections from vibrant, multi-colored vertical neon signs (kanji/Japanese text). Heavy rain effect, strong street light flares, deep blue and magenta color palette. Motion blur streaks emphasize velocity and speed.
negativePrompt: low quality, worst quality, deformed, blurry, missing limbs, extra fingers, malformed, text, signature, watermark, jpeg artifacts, monochrome, poorly drawn, amateur drawing, daytime, clear weather, cartoon
